call: /home/agalvezm/anaconda3/bin/kb count -i index.idx -g t2g.txt -x 10xv2 -o out/ --filter bustools fastqs/CRR126587_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126587_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126588_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126588_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126589_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126589_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126590_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126590_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126591_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126591_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126592_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126592_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126593_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126593_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126594_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126594_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126595_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126595_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126596_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126596_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126597_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126597_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126598_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126598_r2.fastq.gz
commands: kallisto bus -i index.idx -o out/ -x 10xv2 -t 8 fastqs/CRR126587_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126587_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126588_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126588_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126589_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126589_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126590_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126590_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126591_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126591_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126592_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126592_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126593_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126593_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126594_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126594_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126595_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126595_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126596_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126596_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126597_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126597_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126598_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126598_r2.fastq.gz
